Signature, Title,  and Inscription

Below image in black: 55  DANIEL SEGERS FRERE IESUITS / followed by 6 lines in French, Un de premiers painctres .../.../ des Peres Iesuites. / I. Leivens pinxit   I Meyssens excudit
